Package org.cesecore

Class CesecoreException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.cesecore.CesecoreException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CADoesntExistsException, CANameChangeRenewalException, CAOfflineException, CertificateCreateException, CertificateImportException, CryptoTokenAuthenticationFailedException, CryptoTokenOfflineException, CTLogException, ExternalProcessException, IllegalCryptoTokenException, IllegalKeyException, IllegalNameException, IllegalNonceException, IllegalValidityException, InternalKeyBindingNameInUseException, InvalidAlgorithmException, KeyValidatorDoesntExistsException, KeyValidatorExistsException, PrivateKeyNotExtractableException, SignRequestException, SignRequestSignatureException, ValidationException, ValidatorNotApplicableException
    @WebFault
public class CesecoreException
extends Exception
    Base for all specific application exceptions thrown by EJBCA. Can be used to catch any non-critical application exceptions they may be possible to handle: try { . . . } catch (EjbcaException e) { error("Error: blahblah", e); ... }
    Version:
    $Id: CesecoreException.java 26227 2017-08-07 09:48:10Z anatom $
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getErrorCode

        public ErrorCode getErrorCode()
        Get the error code.
        Returns:
        the error code.

      • setErrorCode

        public void setErrorCode​(ErrorCode errorCode)
        Set the error code.
        Parameters:
        errorCode - the error code.

      • getErrorCode

        public static ErrorCode getErrorCode​(Throwable exception)
        Get EJBCA ErrorCode from any exception that is, extends or just wraps CesecoreException
        Parameters:
        exception - exception or its cause from error code should be retrieved
        Returns:
        error code as ErrorCode object, or null if CesecoreException could not be found
